name: Destructable Platformer Demo
description:
Controls:

  • arrows to move
  • shift to jump
  • left click to add matter
  • right click to remove matter
  • D to show hit boxes

This is a game example to show how to use a Marching Squares extension to modify platforms dynamically with GDevelop. This is currently only a proof of concept but I will make the demo open-source in the future.

The assets come from:

  • PixelFrog 
  • GameArt2D
